SELECT SEQ_ANSWER.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_ANSWER ( ANSWER_ID, USER_ID, QUESTION_ID, ANSWER_TITLE, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_IS_PUBLIC, ANSWER_LIKE_COUNT, ANSWER_IS_ADOPTED, DOCTOR_NAME, HOSPITAL_NAME, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE ) SELECT #{answerId}, #{userId}, #{questionId}, '답변', #{answerContent}, #{answerIsPublic}, #{answerLikeCount}, #{answerIsAdopted}, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}), HOSPITAL_NAME, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE FROM TBL_DOCTOR D JOIN TBL_HOSPITAL H ON D.HOSPITAL_ID = H.HOSPITAL_ID AND D.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT ANSWER_ID, USER_ID, QUESTION_ID, ANSWER_TITLE, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_REGISTER_DATETIME, ANSWER_IS_PUBLIC, ANSWER_LIKE_COUNT, ANSWER_IS_ADOPTED, DOCTOR_NAME, NVL(( SELECT COUNT(ANSWER_BOOKMARK_ID) FROM TBL_ANSWER_BOOKMARK GROUP BY ANSWER_ID ), 0) BOOKMARK_COUNT, NVL(( SELECT (COUNT(ANSWER_ID) / (SELECT COUNT(ANSWER_ID) FROM TBL_ANSWER WHERE USER_ID = D.USER_ID GROUP BY USER_ID)) FROM TBL_ANSWER WHERE USER_ID = D.USER_ID AND ANSWER_IS_ADOPTED = 1 GROUP BY USER_ID ), 0) ADOPTED_ANSWER_PERCENT, HOSPITAL_NAME, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE FROM TBL_ANSWER D WHERE QUESTION_ID = #{questionId}

SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_TYPE, U.USER_NAME, COUNT(A.USER_ID) AS ANSWER_COUNT, SUM(A.ANSWER_IS_ADOPTED) AS ADOPTED_ANSWER_COUNT FROM TBL_USER U LEFT JOIN TBL_ANSWER A ON U.USER_ID = A.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_TYPE = 'DOCTOR' AND A.ANSWER_IS_ADOPTED = 1 GROUP BY U.USER_ID, U.USER_TYPE, U.USER_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(A.USER_ID) DESC
